    • getFilteredAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getFilteredAppointments(String time, String contact) throws NullPointerException
      filters appointments in tableview based on user input drop down values for time and contact
      Parameters:
      time - time specification - All, Current Week, or Current Month
      contact - name of contact
      Returns:
      Observable list of filtered appointments based on user input from drop down boxes
      Throws:
      NullPointerException

    • addNewAppointment

      public static void addNewAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, Timestamp start, Timestamp end, int customer_ID, int user_ID, int contact_ID) throws SQLException
      inserts new appointment into appointments table in database
      Parameters:
      title - title of appointment
      description - description of appointment
      location - location of appointment
      type - type of appointment
      start - starting time of appointment
      end - ending time of appointment
      customer_ID - customer ID number
      user_ID - user ID number
      contact_ID - contact ID number
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • modifyAppointment

      public static void modifyAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, Timestamp startTS, Timestamp endTS, int customerID, int userID, int contactID, int appointmentID) throws SQLException
      Modifies existing Appointment in appointments table per user input
      Parameters:
      title - title of appointment
      description - description of appointment
      location - location of appointment
      type - type of appointment
      startTS - start date/time of appointment
      endTS - end date/time of appointment
      customerID - customer ID number
      userID - user ID number
      contactID - contact ID number
      appointmentID - appointment ID number (unique)
      Throws:
      SQLException
